name: Infinity Trip
description: Infinity Trip is a simple and addictive endless runner game. You control a little ship gliding through a beautiful exotic world, avoiding obstacles and collecting coins to unlock new cool spaceships.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 45 MB available space
